name: Spermination: Cream of the Crop
description:
Spermination: perilously racing for a loaded Sperm Bank and gestating Bundles of Joy!

Choose from 3 different racing leagues, each with more risks, but higher rewards

Skillfully fly near walls or kill to reduce your Threat Level and survive longer

Prepare Your Load with weapons, afterburners, shields and more

Balance control, speed, energy use and damage output, as long as you can afford it!

VR is supported, but not required. Uses OpenXR (using SteamVR as your OpenXR runtime)
